news.title: My Bloody Valentine episode of Hot Press Classics out now - feat. Thurston Moore
news.summary: Recorded in 19 different studios over two-and-a-half years, Paul Nolan and Kilian Murphy are ready to unveil their career-defining masterpiece: a podcast on My Bloody Valentine's landmark 1991 classic, Loveless. Plus an interview with Thurston Moore.

news.title: Research finds 97% of listeners can't tell the difference between AI-generated and human-made music
